reviews.review: Muito Bom!! Tirando os hacks, da pra se divertir!
Good game, but lot of hackers.

Моя любимая игра, очень нравится боёвка, стилистика и сеттинг. Крайне прикольно - раскраски на пушки, моя самая любимая - черная линия. Интересный сюжет и квесты, проработанные персонажи (каждый со своим характером)(мой самый любимай - Бот Сесил). Мир полностью живой, много интерактивности, но вот что говорят  турки по рации я до сих по не eбy, шабута. Ставьте лайки и подспидывайтесь на меня в Steam, скоро будут новый обзоры .
sa imi bag pula in jocu vostru plin de rusi si codati
El juego esta bien pero que tengas que esperar 7 dias para tradear esta mal.
krásná hra jenom by to chtělo trochu odstranit hack komunitu  a dat šanci lepšího dropu s lvlu :)
Paguei 25 reais e acho q deveria voltar a ser pago! Enquanto esta grátis so aumentou o número de cheaters

Esse jogo simplesmente marcou minha adolescência. Existe algo inexplicável nesse jogo que te prende a ele.
Existem outros jogos com gráficos muito superiores ao do CSGO, mas eu não consigo deixar de gostar de jogar e acompanhar os campeonatos de CSGO.
O único contra, infelizmente são os cheaters.
понравилось все кромк того что она стала бесплатна и читереров много
If I've learned anything about this game during all the hours I've played it is that, 50% of the time, rushing B works all the time.
very competitive but fun with a good group

This is hands down one of my favorite games of all time. Skill actually matters here. I switched to fortnite for a year and the current state of that game just makes so many deaths feel cheap and people don't always have to be better than you to win a fight. But with CSGO this is not the case. Nothing feels cheap. This is pure competition.
Im kinda happy with this game, but we need 128 tick servers and new operation soon.
The only thing I don't like about this game is people being better than me
